post_text: September 14, 2015 at 7:32 AM#1Hi.How can I write a macro to change between rgb and cmy on the settings?

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: September 14, 2015 at 7:32 AM#1Hi.How can I write a macro to change between rgb and cmy on the settings?

posts.author: wburnss
posts.post_text: September 14, 2015 at 8:47 AM#2Hi,cd UserProfilecd usernameas 1 /DefaultMixColorReadout=cmy or rgbcd/

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: September 14, 2015 at 9:15 AM#3Works great thank you

title: Macro to change cmy and rgb
